channel.title: Good Things To Fix if Going to Host nrs3server v2
channel.description:
[center]Hello Mopars, Idk if you do anything with this release whatever.. but though if your starting to host Nrs3server v2, You may Fix These bugs/error's so it would be a Nice Server.[/center]
[center]and btw i <3 Nrs3server, timers3 is Cool ;D[/center]
Some error's/Bugs : when you kill monster the drops coming very very late. and the npc stays there for long time also.. [IMG]http://i1270.photobucket.com/albums/jj601/im1prins1/1.png[/img]
[size=18pt]most of shops/things in Home says nothing interesting happens.. should fix that[/size]
[size=18pt]when buying something from g.e it takes long after you typed and the item list comes[/size]
[size=18pt]when using map you should add the thing shows where are you[/size]
[size=18pt]fix toolbelt[/size]
And some more, coming soon..
[size=12pt]Note :[/size] Nrs3server is Perfectly Coded Rsps, and i like it soo much! just finded some error's/bugs of it.. Im not interested if you like or not, but though to put this here is someony gonna host then they should fix those.
[size=36pt]Thanks For your Time![/size]

item.title: Good Things To Fix if Going to Host nrs3server v2
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

I know that the npc’s thing is the anti-leech… and maybe the shops too.

Read full topic
item.source: Good Things To Fix if Going to Host nrs3server v2

item.title: Good Things To Fix if Going to Host nrs3server v2

item.description:
@TehDevTeam wrote:

[center]Hello Mopars, Idk if you do anything with this release whatever… but though if your starting to host Nrs3server v2, You may Fix These bugs/error’s so it would be a Nice Server.[/center]

[center]and btw i <3 Nrs3server, timers3 is Cool ;D[/center]

Some error’s/Bugs :
when you kill monster the drops coming very very late. and the npc stays there for long time also…

[size=18pt]most of shops/things in Home says nothing interesting happens… should fix that[/size]

[size=18pt]when buying something from g.e it takes long after you typed and the item list comes[/size]

[size=18pt]when using map you should add the thing shows where are you[/size]

[size=18pt]fix toolbelt[/size]

And some more, coming soon…

[size=12pt]Note :[/size] Nrs3server is Perfectly Coded Rsps, and i like it soo much! just finded some error’s/bugs of it…
Im not interested if you like or not, but though to put this here is someony gonna host then they should fix those.

[size=36pt]Thanks For your Time![/size]
